Machine is playable, but there are several problems.

-The game volume is set so it can barely be heard.
-The one-way gate in the plunger lane is missing (though a well-timed nudge will get the ball to go in the swamp)
-There is a noticeable right-lean, and the machine is in need of leg adjustments
-Knocker is removed/disconnected/broken
-"Thing" flipper (upper left flipper) is the wrong size--it should be a mini-flipper

-Probably the biggest problem with this machine is the fact that THE LEFT OUTLANE RAIL IS MISSING. (!!!) This creates the biggest left outlane hole I've ever seen--about 2 inches.

-A card on the machine says $1 per play, but the machine is set at $0.50 per play.

These policies NEED to change, even if it means charging per play.
